item.title: Canada Is About to Lose Its Status as Having Eliminated Measles
item.description: One province with an outsize number of cases has seen a collision of politics and public health policy.

item.title: How China’s Rare Earth Chokehold Could Strangle Europe’s Military Buildup
item.description: Drones, missiles and other crucial components of Europe’s rush to rearm itself rely on an increasingly unsteady supply of minerals from China.
